name: Talking Puppies, virtual pets to care, your virtual pet doggie to take care and play
name_original: Talking Puppies, virtual pets to care, your virtual pet doggie to take care and play
description:
Talking Puppies is your new virtual pet game when doggie can talk.
Talking Puppies is a free game very realistic virtual pet, done in 3d which is able to repeat what you say with a funny voice. It is also a virtual pet you have to care and feeding.
Choose a puppy, give it a name and play. You can take care of the dog and any time you can change your appearance and name.
You can take pictures to use as wallpaper or share with friends.
You must care for and feed. Occasionally needs a good bubble bath.
The bathroom is the most spectacular moment, you'll see authentic foam and bubbles. If the puppy was dirty, as you rub will go running clean.
Play and touch your puppy so do not be sad.
Talk to the dog by pressing the microphone button.
Earn points playing the minigame to buy food and accessories for your puppy.
Also you can earn px watching ads videos.

Features:
You can feed your puppy with milk, food or treats.
You can talk to the dog and he responds like so funny
The puppy gets fat or thin realistically.
If the dog is dirty, pudes bathe with lots of foam and many bubbles will be made.
You can take a picture at any time.
Visit the store to buy food and accessories. Points can be earned by playing.
Includes card game 'Memory Kitty' to earn points and expedite the mind.


This app includes advertising to support the developer, try not very invasive.
Advertising can eliminate buying premium account by clicking on the button 'No ads'.

If you need to buy many items, you can purchase 50000px and equip your puppy.
